list.name: Changes
list.comment: Edit Progress #23: * Implemented a new worm enemy (can't attack yet due to lack of animation or take damage) * Added some new assets (most are still a WIP) * Began working on a tutorial state tho not much progress was made again due to lack of actual assets to work with Old but still relavant goals: * (TODO) - Add healthpacks or bandages or something that drop from the containers in the level and that the player can store in their "inventory" which can increase their health throughout the levels * (TODO) - Complete ballista object and arrow projectile * (TODO) - Complete beastiary and instructions gamestates * (TODO) - Add a 2nd set of levels and boss fight

task.summary: Default task
Ep 3 - Complete
Ep 4 - Complete
Ep 5 - Complete
Ep 6 - Complete
Ep 7 - Complete
Ep 8 - Complete

Ep 9 - Complete
*Creating hitboxes and checking for collision

Ep 10 - Complete
*Fixing character floating 1 pixel above ground *Added animations for falling and jumping * Added gravity

Ep 11 - Complete
*Added gamestates to allow user to switch between menu and playing etc.

#12
*Added Menu Buttons & the option to exit the game etc. *Fixed some bugs related to playermovement speed being independent from GameScale and the hitbox of the player being floats instead of ints creating problems when gamescale wasn't an integer.

Edit Progress 13
*Added pause menu into the game and also the button associated with them *Working on adding volume slider to affect sound effects and music

Edit Progress 13.5
*Added pause menu into the game and also the button associated with them *Finished adding volume slider to affect sound effects and music and also create bounds so that the button cannot extend past the slider.

Edit Progress 14
*Added menu background image so that it's not just a white screen *Added an automatic scrolling funtion that allows the player to move to the level off their screen by checking position and creating an offset if they're in the first 20% or last 20% of the level.

Edit Progress 16
*Added crab enemies to the game and created the enemy manager to be able implement other enemies in the future. * Used green value of level mapper to indicate if an enemy should exist and where it should be placed.
Edit Progress 16.1
Edit Progress (Incomplete) * Began working on testing the tree animation for boss fight in the gameOverlay but wasn't able to finish it and this needs to be complete.

Edit Progress (Incomplete) * Began working on testing the tree animation for boss fight in the gameOverlay but wasn't able to finish it and this needs to be complete. * NEW - Added Stamina bar and added all related methods.
Edit Progress 20?(Complete) *Added more levels to the game and made the code overall less redundant. *Need to try to make a way to read all the level files without using a magic number
Save Note: Comitting so that when I attempt to change the size of all the assets and how the levels are mapped everything isn't ruined.
Commit for submission

Edit Progress #22: * Completed the object classes and works on the traps for the game so that the player can take damage and die from regular object. * (TODO) - Add healthpacks or bandages or something that drop from the containers in the level and that the player can store in their "inventory" which can increase their health throughout the levels * (TODO) - Complete ballista object and arrow projectile * (TODO) - Create subclasses for the player class

Edit Progress #23: * Implemented a new worm enemy (can't attack yet due to lack of animation or take damage) * Added some new assets (most are still a WIP) * Began working on a tutorial state tho not much progress was made again due to lack of actual assets to work with Old but still relavant goals: * (TODO) - Add healthpacks or bandages or something that drop from the containers in the level and that the player can store in their "inventory" which can increase their health throughout the levels * (TODO) - Complete ballista object and arrow projectile * (TODO) - Complete beastiary and instructions gamestates * (TODO) - Add a 2nd set of levels and boss fight
